job_history.work_description: Implemented fixed assets internal controls, created depreciation schedules, files, and monitored capital expenditures. Accountable for fixed assets capitalization, depreciation, and amortization. Implemented payroll-HRO module, set up conferences calls, prepared implementation presentation, and trained staff. Analyzed general ledger accounts to ensure financial statements were accurate and reliable.

Prepared several reports such as operating expense reports, sales reports, revenue, and COGS analysis reports. Managed capital and non-capital projects, prepared fixed asset capitalization, fixed asset cycle count, reviewed for impairment, and retired assets as needed.

Performed general accounting duties, prepared journal entries, balanced month-end closing transactions, monitored inter-company transactions, and confirmed balances at month-end. Participated in the new ERP implementation and prepared monthly headcount reports.

Managed to downsize account reconciliation balance from 83 to 0.75 million dollars on open balances. Processed non-sufficient funds checks, ACH, and wires. Reconciled over 15 bank accounts, including FED account.

Reconciled bank accounts cleared more than 0.75 million in open items. Monitored FED account discrepancies. Processed non-sufficient fund checks, ACH, and monitored Puerto Rico and Orlando transactions.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience reconciling bank accounts, including FED accounts, and has successfully downsized account reconciliation balances, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in general accounting duties, including journal entries, month-end closing transactions, and inter-company transactions, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Implemented payroll-HRO module and trained staff, showing a solid working proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed general ledger accounts to ensure financial statements were accurate and reliable, and prepared various reports, including operating expense reports and COGS analysis reports, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Fixed Asset Management
skills.explanation: Implemented fixed assets internal controls, created depreciation schedules, and monitored capital expenditures, indicating strong proficiency in fixed asset management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Trained staff on payroll-HRO module implementation, showing some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: ERP Implementation
skills.explanation: Participated in the new ERP implementation, showing a solid working proficiency in ERP implementation.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: No direct mention of Microsoft Excel usage, but likely used for financial analysis and reporting, however, without direct evidence, the level is set to 0.
